headline.main: Outcry in Connecticut Brings Back Canceled Halloween Parades
headline.print_headline: Outcry in Connecticut Brings Back Canceled Halloween Parades

docs.snippet: A Connecticut city's school system that canceled Halloween costume parades at its elementary schools has reversed its decision following an outcry from parents....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Connecticut city's school system that canceled Halloween costume parades at its elementary schools has reversed its decision following an outcry from parents.

headline.main: Jinx? Texas Governor Congratulates Astros Before Collapse

headline.main: Texas Lawmaker Uninjured When He Crashes Plane Into Fence
headline.print_headline: Texas Lawmaker Uninjured When He Crashes Plane Into Fence

docs.snippet: Texas state Sen. Kel Seliger was not injured when he accidentally drove his single-engine plane onto a vehicle service road and ran into a chain-link fence at Dallas Love Field....
docs.lead_paragraph: Texas state Sen. Kel Seliger was not injured when he accidentally drove his single-engine plane onto a vehicle service road and ran into a chain-link fence at Dallas Love Field.

headline.main: Warriors NBA Team Buys Land for San Francisco Basketball Arena
headline.print_headline: Warriors NBA Team Buys Land for San Francisco Basketball Arena

docs.snippet: The Golden State Warriors basketball team on Monday acquired a 12-acre site in San Francisco's Mission Bay neighborhood where it plans to build a new, 18,000-seat arena for the reigning NBA champs....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Golden State Warriors basketball team on Monday acquired a 12-acre site in San Francisco's Mission Bay neighborhood where it plans to build a new, 18,000-seat arena for the reigning NBA champs.

headline.main: Fighting New Diseases by Giving Them Blander Labels
headline.print_headline: ‘You Discovered It, You Name It’ Is Out

docs.snippet: The World Health Organization issued strict guidelines for naming infections. For example, names of groups (Legionnaire’s) and places (Ebola) are out....
docs.abstract: The World Health Organization issued strict guidelines for naming infections. For example, names of groups (Legionnaire’s) and places (Ebola) are out.

headline.main: Del Bosque Faces Tricky Task to Select Spain Squad
headline.print_headline: Del Bosque Faces Tricky Task to Select Spain Squad
